document.discussion_title: Nicky Deverdics is more convinced than ever he’s made right decision joining Hartlepool United after Preston North End display
document.topic_text: Search Nicky Deverdics is more convinced than ever he’s made right decision joining Hartlepool United after Preston North End display 0 Have your say Nicky Deverdics is more convinced than ever he has made the right decision to join Hartlepool United. The 27-year-old admitted he was frustrated to be named on the bench for last Saturday’s League Two opener with Colchester United. He got on late and performed well, but for a man who played almost every minute of last season for Dover Athletic, it was not what he was looking for. Deverdics told SportMail in the summer that he was here to play and not just make up the numbers. But he got his chance to impress on Tuesday in the EFL Cup at Preston North End and he duly did... read more
